social.add_user_topic: INSERT INTO BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic (sessionid, subject, text, name, email, categoryid, portable, createddate) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8)
social.count_category_topics: SELECT count(*) FROM BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic WHERE categoryid = $1
social.count_category_comments: SELECT count(*) FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st ON sc.id = st.categoryid JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopiccomment stc ON st.id = stc.topicid WHERE sc.id = $1;
social.count_topic_comments: SELECT count(*) FROM BOOTLINE.f_socialtopiccomment WHERE topicid = $1
social.get_category_by_id: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory WHERE active = TRUE AND id = $1;
social.get_topic_by_id: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st ON sc.id = st.categoryid WHERE st.id = $1;
social.get_all_active_categories: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory WHERE active = TRUE;
social.get_all_topics_by_category_id: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st JOIN BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc ON st.categoryid = sc.id WHERE st.categoryid = $1 AND sc.active = TRUE
social.get_top_topics_by_category_id: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st ON sc.id = st.categoryid WHERE sc.id = $1 AND sc.active = TRUE AND st.reviewed = TRUE LIMIT 5;
social.get_recent_topics_by_category_id: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st ON sc.id = st.categoryid WHERE sc.id = $1 AND sc.active = TRUE AND st.createddate > current_date - interval '5' day LIMIT 5;
social.get_recent_gratitudes_topics: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.d_socialcategory sc JOIN BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic st ON sc.id = st.categoryid WHERE sc.id = 2 LIMIT 5;
social.get_all_comments_for_topic_order_by_crea: SELECT * FROM BOOTLINE.f_socialtopiccomment WHERE topicid = $1 ORDER BY createddate DESC;
social.add_new_comment_to_topic: INSERT INTO BOOTLINE.f_socialtopiccomment (topicid, name, comment, createddate) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4);
social.create_new_user_topic: INSERT INTO BOOTLINE.f_socialtopic (sessionid, subject, text, name, email, categoryid, portable, createddate) VALUES ('site',$1,$2,$3,$4,$5,false,now())

stats.update_count_users: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET countusers = countusers + 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
stats.update_plus_count_active_users: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET activeusers = activeusers + 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
stats.update_minus_count_active_users: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET activeusers = activeusers - 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
stats.update_pressedstartapp: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET pressedstartapp = pressedstartapp + 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
stats.update_pressedstartapp_chrome: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET pressedstartapp_chrome = pressedstartapp_chrome + 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
stats.update_downloadportable: UPDATE bootline.f_statistic SET downloadportable = downloadportable + 1 WHERE time_create = now()::date;
